content: free no-sew small goldfish crochet pattern about thank you for downlaoding my pattern andi hope you will enjoy this pattern please do not claim this pattern as your own copy it or sell it you may happily sell finished products if you use this pattern please tag me @naomi _ crochet on instagram so i can see your creations materials abbreviations chenille yarn i used magic_ring magic_ring himalya dolphin baby single_crochet single_crochet 100g/120mt increase increase 4 5mm crochet hook decrease decrease 6mm or 8mm saftey eyes bbl st 5dc double_crochet optional bobble stitch scissors half_double_crochet half_double_crochet sewing needle r round stuffing f o fasten_off stitch marker pattern created by @naomi _ crochet free no-sew small goldfish crochet pattern the pattern r1 6sc in a magic_ring 6 r2 6inc 12 r3 - 5 single_crochet around 12 r6 bbl st 5sc x2 12 *you can add eyes between row 2-3 on one side and between row 3-4 on the other side or you can sew the eyes in the end between the same row* r7 - 8 single_crochet around 12 *stuff fish* r9 6dec 6 *finish stuffing the fish* r10 fold in half and 3sc through both sides 3 r11 chain 1 turn fish 2hdc in each stitch 6 r12 chain 1 turn fish 6sc 6 f o and weave the yarn into the body of the fish pattern created by @naomi _ crochet free no-sew small goldfish crochet pattern top fin insert your hook at the center of the fish s body about 1 row from the tail chain 2 make 2hdc in the next row in the same row twice and make one more half_double_crochet in the next row of the body and f 0 hide yarn in body click on the photo to watch how to make the top fin congrats you just finished your small goldfish pattern created by @naomi _ crochet
